Apache Spark Course Book Ambarish Ganguly 2022-10-06 Chapter 1 Introduction The picture is from the website Apache Spark This is a little book on Apache Spark. You can install Apache Spark in your machine and start learning with the following chapters. Each chapter has an image , which when clicked will go to a video which explains the topic.
